UniprotID	Q8N6C5-3
Accession	Q8N6C5;B5MEG2;H9KV64;O15070;Q9NTC8
EntryName	IGSF1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Immunoglobulin superfamily member 1 (IgSF1) (Immunoglobulin-like domain-containing protein 1) (Inhibin-binding protein) (InhBP) (Pituitary gland-specific factor 2) (p120)
GeneName	IGSF1 IGDC1 KIAA0364 PGSF2
Length	242
Function	Seems to be a coreceptor in inhibin signaling, but seems not to be a high-affinity inhibin receptor. Antagonizes activin A signaling in the presence or absence of inhibin B (By similarity). Necessary to mediate a specific antagonistic effect of inhibin B on activin-stimulated transcription.
Subcellular Location	Membrane; Membrane; Secreted
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility
